Thesis

Geodesic Convolution

This post shows an idea to generalise convolutional layers from images (functions on $\mathbb{R}^2$) to functions on triangulated manifolds.

Heat Method

The heat method, used to calculate geodesic distance on a triangulated mesh

Geodesics on Manifolds

The discription to approximate the geodesic, using a linear approxiamtion and a quadratic approximation.

This post is devoted to the Fast Marching Method.

Discrete Laplace Beltrami

This post show the implementation of the discrete laplace operator. See the github repo for the jupyter notebook.
